battlesim.Title: Cannot Simulate Battle
battlesim.Body: One or both Pokemon inputs were incorrect. Select from the provided list and try again.

battlesim.Title: Cannot Simulate Battle
battlesim.Body: **{0}** is not a spawnable Pokemon that you can fight. Use **/help spawn** for more information.

daycare.Title: Daycare Empty
daycare.Body: You have no Pokemon currently in your daycare. To add a Pokemon, specify one when running this command.

daycare.Title: Cannot Add To Daycare
daycare.Body: You already have two Pokemon in the daycare. Run this command without specifying a Pokemon to remove one, then try again.

daycare.Title: Cannot Add To Daycare
daycare.Body: You do not own any **{0}** to add to the daycare. Try again.

evolve.Title: Cannot Evolve
evolve.Body: You have no Pokemon in your party that are able to evolve. Level your Pokemon up by fighting or feeding it candy.

givecandy.Title: No Candies
givecandy.Body: You do not have any candies to give to your Pokemon. You can buy some through the **/shop**.

givecandy.Title: Cannot Give Candy
givecandy.Body: You do not own any **{0}** to give a candy to. Try again.

hatch.Title: Nothing To Hatch
hatch.Body: None of your eggs are ready to hatch. Use the **/spawn** command to prep them and check their status through **/myeggs**.

hatch.Title: No Eggs
hatch.Body: You currently do not own any eggs. To claim an egg, use the **/daily** command that resets every day at midnight UTC.

pokeinfo.Title: No Results
pokeinfo.Body: The Pokemon you are trying to search for does not seem to exist. Try again using the given prompts and filters.

pokeinfo.Title: No Results
pokeinfo.Body: There seem to be no Pokemon categorized under the color **{0}**. Try again using the given prompts and filters.

pokeinfo.Title: No Results
pokeinfo.Body: There seem to be no Pokemon categorized under the type **{0}**. Try again using the given prompts and filters.

pokeinfo.Title: No Results
pokeinfo.Body: There was a problem trying to retrieve the information requested. Try again using the given prompts and filters.

pokeshop.Title: No Money
pokeshop.Body: You do not have any Money to make an exchange.

pokeshop.Title: Pokemon Does Not Exist
pokeshop.Body: The Pokemon you are trying to obtain does not exist.

pokeshop.Title: Cannot Exchange
pokeshop.Body: You are not able to obtain a {0} through the shop.

pokeshop.Title: Not Enough Money
pokeshop.Body: You do not have enough Money to make an exchange for a {0}.

pokeshop.Title: Not Enough Masterballs
pokeshop.Body: You do not have enough Masterballs to make an exchange for a {0}.

spawn.Title: Failed To Spawn
spawn.Body: Something went wrong trying to spawn a Pokemon. This interaction still went towards any egg progress you may have.

spawnlegendary.Title: Cannot Find A Legendary
spawnlegendary.Body: You have not completed the gym challenge for this region! Defeat all Gym Leaders through **/gymbattle** and try again.

spawnlegendary.Title: Cannot Find A Legendary
spawnlegendary.Body: You have already captured a Legendary Pokemon in this region! Defeat the Elite Four through **/elitefour** to be able to find more.

spawnlegendary.Title: Cannot Find A Legendary
spawnlegendary.Body: You have already captured all Legendary Pokemon in this region! Swap to another region to find more.

usepotion.Title: No Potions
usepotion.Body: You do not have any potions available for use! Visit the **/shop** to buy more.

wishlist.Title: Successfully Added To Wish List
wishlist.Body: **{0}** has just been added to your wish list.

wishlist.Title: Wish List Empty
wishlist.Body: You have no Pokemon currently in your wish list. To add a Pokemon, specify one when running this command.

wishlist.Title: Cannot Add To Wish List
wishlist.Body: You already have five Pokemon in the wish list. Run this command without specifying a Pokemon to remove one, then try again.

wishlist.Title: Cannot Add To Wish List
wishlist.Body: You already have **{0}** added to your wish list.

wishlist.Title: Cannot Add To Wish List
wishlist.Body: The Pokemon **{0}** cannot be spawned through events.
